hopobject.name: MSU ECE480
hopobject.pname: MSU ECE480 Senior Design: Home Automation HMI Demo
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.30)
hopobject.body: Using a beagle board equipped with Linux 2.6.28 and Java VM, we will create a home control panel which will let users control various devices around the household, such as lighing, climate control, and even a video doorbell.
hopobject.shortdesc: Use the TI OMAP3 series processor to develop an interactive home automation control panel.
